text.div:
Screened for Tobacco, Received Cessation Intervention as Tobacco User

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cpt
    Code Display
    4004F Patient screened for tobacco use and received tobacco cessation intervention (counseling, pharmacotherapy, or both), if identified as a tobacco user (PV, CAD)

name: Screened for Tobacco, Received Cessation Intervention as Tobacco User
